name: Tech Romancer
overview: Straight out of classic Japanese anime movies comes Tech Romancer, the crushing 3-D fighter. Monstrous mechanoids battle in sprawling 3-D environments, dwarfing cities and obliterating buildings. Discover hidden power-ups to upgrade weapons, repair damage and enhance robot agility. Unlock and view the complete original Tech Romancer anime movie and play Sega Dreamcast VMU mini-games anytime, anywhere. Tech Romancer will leave you in a twisted heap of metal madness
